text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text: ――My children!!

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Siblings
text_block_list.text: Yes, father.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text:
This family has gathered much strength, cultivated it, 
and has reached this point. Power is wealth, talent, 
authority……and our ambition. As such, as your father――

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text:
For all of your sakes, the next head of the 
family will be the 『Strongest』 among you.

text_block_list.name: Young Gentil
text_block_list.text:
Ara. In that case…… The next head shall be me, would 
it be fine to interpret your words in that way, father?

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Father
text_block_list.text:
Fuu……do not be so hasty, Gentil. 
That will be if――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
『You become the strongest in this family』 
……Heh.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Expressing it in another way, it is quite simple. 
The outcome of this battle, and the radiance of 
that future――……will be decided by one's own "Power".

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: That is all.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Younger Brother
text_block_list.text:
Gentil. 
My project now includes our oldest sister and uncle.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Younger Brother
text_block_list.text:
To gather and to administer. This is also ability. 
If you are still trying to become the strongest in this house――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara ara……Ho ho ho……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
You are as cute as always, are you not? To become the 
strongest in this house……focusing on something so trivial.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Younger Brother
text_block_list.text: ……You. Those were father's words――……wait, what is that?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
The "World". ……Hey, just think about this. Does being 
the strongest mean becoming the strongest in this house? 
Does it mean winning against everyone in this country?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: No. Becoming the strongest means……the strongest in this world――!!

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Younger Brother
text_block_list.text: Wha――……huh……?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara, pardon me……it was unexpectedly "soft".

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Older Sister
text_block_list.text:
…… 
That was supposed to be custom-made steel.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Older Sister
text_block_list.text:
Gentil. Lend me your brother, we have a report to make to 
father. We will be starting to do business in Western Europe.

text_block_list.name: Gentil's Older Sister
text_block_list.text:
……power is not limited to things that can only be 
seen. This blade which you can hardly hold, is still 
enough to reach the neck of an arrogant girl.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I am quite aware. Whether it be out of jealousy or envy…… 
feel free to point your blade at whatever you desire.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
I am not so soft that……something of 
this degree would be enough to break me.

Tracen Academy Training Course. There were a 
lot of people in the spectator seats that day.
choice_data_list: There are so many people today……

text_block_list.text:
But, it made sense. The race being held today was a highly 
anticipated match race. The main focus of attention was――

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Verxina……last time she was first in the 『Selection Race』, right? 
Her speed and race sense are clearly a level above.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Right, her speed and competitive sense are top notch. Without 
a doubt, she'll be one to pay attention to. ……However, today――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Gentil-san. How are you feeling? You were absent 
from the 『Selection Race』 the other day.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Ara, I apologize for that. 
I just felt that it was unnecessary to attend.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Heh. 
Are you saying it's necessary to race against me now?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Since you now carry with you a first place 
result, it is finally worthwhile to crush you.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Now, would you entertain me? 
Use that effort to help me climb higher.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……No, you won't be climbing, you will fall. 
…………don't misunderstand that.

Even though I didn't really know much about the relationship 
between the two of them, I could still feel the tension in 
the air. Then those two got in to position――!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
That was a good start, wasn't it? 
And……that's quite a nice draft.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Do as you please! 
I already expected that and have built up my stamina!!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara……well, well……!

Both of them round the third corner maintaining the same 
position. I wonder if they were conserving their stamina 
for the second half. And then they entered the 4th corner――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Here!!

Verxina entered the spurt early. Would she 
still have the stamina from this point? And 
then the battle was decided in one moment……!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Hmmmph!!!!!!!
――In that moment, a loud roaring filled my ears.

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text: !? In an instant, Gentil is beside her!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
What strength……!? 
I had heard rumors but……now that I've seen it……!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Kuu…… 
Gentil……donna……!! Wait――

text_block_list.name: Gentil & Verxina
text_block_list.text:
――Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!! 
……Ah……Aaah……Aaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
5 lengths…… 
Against Verxina, 5……?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
N-……No!! That can't be!! One more race! 
I'll be ready in a moment, and next time――!!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Don't say something so boring.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
You should already realize it. 
Your plan was crushed and you used up all of your stamina.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……your challenge has no merit for me. A battle with a forgone 
conclusion is only abuse. I have no time for such a thing.
……The race from earlier came to mind.

In my mind, the sounds of the earth beneath her feet reverberated. 
The dust flying in the air, the rush of the wind and――

Just what was what? Just how powerful was 
her running!? My curiousity was overflowing 
and before I realized it, my legs were moving――!
